data.title: SonicWall AG & Telecom Services SA
data.meta_description:
SonicWall AG  and Telecom Services SA, a close collaboration already initiated in 2003, crowned with the award of "Boundless Cybersecurity Solutions Partner of the Year 2020" in Switzerland. 

We are present together again at Swiss Cyber Security Days to highlight innovative and proven deep level of protection accross company's portfolio security solutions for all entreprises' sizes.

Originally founded in 1991, SonicWall has been fighting the cyber-criminal industry for over 25 years defending small, medium-size businesses and enterprises worldwide. Backed by research from the Global Response Intelligent Defense (GRID) Threat Network, our award-winning real-time breach detection and prevention solutions, coupled with the formidable resources of over 10,000 loyal channel partners around the globe, are the backbone securing more than a million business and mobile networks and their emails, applications and data.
data.text:
SonicWall AG and Telecom Services SA, a close collaboration already initiated in 2003, crowned with the award of "Boundless Cybersecurity Solutions Partner of the Year 2020" in Switzerland.

We are present together again at Swiss Cyber Security Days to highlight innovative and proven deep level of protection accross company's portfolio security solutions for all entreprises' sizes.

Originally founded in 1991, SonicWall has been fighting the cyber-criminal industry for over 25 years defending small, medium-size businesses and enterprises worldwide. Backed by research from the Global Response Intelligent Defense (GRID) Threat Network, our award-winning real-time breach detection and prevention solutions, coupled with the formidable resources of over 10,000 loyal channel partners around the globe, are the backbone securing more than a million business and mobile networks and their emails, applications and data.
